rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language about control measures.
'will be safely disposed of', 'will be cleaned and cleared' are containment actions, Neutral per rule 5.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports disposal and cleaning procedures; 'safely disposed of' refers to the process, not public safety.
The segment does not contain a bare negation without an explicit calming cue.
States 'All poultry will be safely disposed of... and the sites will be cleaned and cleared of the infection', describing planned response protocols/safeguards without active reassurance.
